full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,YE SHES KYI MKHA' 'GRO MA SENGGE'I GDONG CAN GTZO 'KHOR GSUN GYI BDAG MDUN BSKANG BSHAGS BSTOD BSKUL BSGRAL BA'I GTOR BZLOG DANG BCAS PA'I RNAM BZHAG MKHA' 'GRO DGONGS BRGYAN ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @036A *, ,(DPAL YE SHES KYI MKHA' 'GRO MA SENGGE'I GDONG PA CAN GTZO 'KHOR GSUM GYI BDAG MDUN BSKANG BSHAGS BSKUL BSGRAL LAS @036B GTOR BZLOG DANG BCAS PA'I RNAM BZHAG MKHA' 'GRO'I DGONGS BRGYAN ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, SNGA SOR GZHUNG LUGS DU MA LA SPOBS PA MCHOG TU RAB 'BYAMS SMRA BA NGAG DBANG SHES RAB KYIS BSKUL TE HAR CHEN THU MED KYIS CHAR GSAR RTZOM BGYIS ZHIG YOD KYANG DIR BSGRAL LAS KYI RIM PA MA TSAM PAR BRTEN PHYIS SU MDZOD, ,DGE STONG DON GNYER BA 'GA' ZHIG CHA TSING DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA'I NGOR @037A *, ,SNGA MA LA BSGYUR 'GONG PHRAN BU DANG, KHA SBYOR DBYE BA'I BSKOR KHANG KHA BSKANG TE, BTZUN PA DKON MCHOG 'JIGS MED DBANG PO SRAS GA-YAR KHRAL DU SBYAR BA DGE BAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
